mapper.insert: INSERT INTO product (prod_no, prod_name, prod_detail, manufacture_day, price, image_file, reg_date) VALUES (seq_product_prod_no.nextval, #{prodName}, #{prodDetail}, #{manuDate}, #{price}, #{fileName}, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT pd.prod_no, pd.prod_name, pd.prod_detail, pd.manufacture_day, pd.price, pd.image_file, pd.reg_date, tr.tran_status_code FROM product pd, transaction tr WHERE pd.prod_no=tr.prod_no(+) AND pd.prod_no = #{value}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM ( SELECT pd.prod_no, pd.prod_name, pd.prod_detail, pd.manufacture_day, pd.price, pd.image_file, pd.reg_date, tr.tran_status_code FROM product pd, transaction tr
pd.prod_no=tr.prod_no(+)
AND (tr.tran_status_code IS NULL OR tr.tran_status_code =4)
AND (tr.tran_status_code=1 OR tr.tran_status_code=2 OR tr.tran_status_code=3)
AND pd.prod_no like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND pd.prod_name like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND pd.price like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
ORDER BY
pd.prod_no DESC
pd.price
pd.price DESC
) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{startRowNum} AND #{endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT pd.prod_no,tr.tran_status_code FROM product pd, transaction tr
pd.prod_no=tr.prod_no(+)
AND (tr.tran_status_code IS NULL OR tr.tran_status_code =4)
AND (tr.tran_status_code=1 OR tr.tran_status_code=2 OR tr.tran_status_code=3)
AND pd.prod_no like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND pd.prod_name like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
AND pd.price like '%' ||#{searchKeyword}|| '%'
) countTable
